comments:
Now that we have ResourceMappings, it would be nice to be able to have the 
ability to contribute lightweight decorators to them. I have an patch that 
does this.

Created an attachment (id=18184)
Patch to org.eclipse.ui.workbench

This patch adds general adaptability to lightweight decorators. It uses the
same code that is used by the objectContribution adaptability.

Created an attachment (id=18185)
Patch to org.eclipse.ui.tests

Test added for geneal adaptability.
The CVS UI code has been release to a branch (branch_20050222_bug86159)

Tod, I'm bypassing the UI inbox. Since you said you wouldn't submit this until 
after EclipseCon, I'll assign it to you now and test over the next week or 
two. I'll let you know if I need to modify the patches at all.

Created an attachment (id=24364)
Updated patch for 3.1

Created an attachment (id=24365)
Oatch to CVS UI

Created an attachment (id=25680)
Updated patch for tests

Created an attachment (id=25681)
Updated patch for workbench

I have updated these patches but currently this causes a failure in the
DecoratorAdaptableTests:
